|area_total_km2 = 12.92 |area_land_km2 = 12.87 |area_water_km2 = 0.04 |population_density_km2 = 1303.14 }} Country Club Hills is a city in Illinois in the United States. It is in Cook County. == Notable people == * Danny Clark, linebacker for the New York Giants * Koko Taylor, blues singer * Marquice Cole, defensive back for the New York Jets == References == Category:Cities in Illinois Category:Suburbs of Chicago Category:Settlements in Cook County, Illinois
